column5: someone mentioned good cubans at the end of a long day of angling. poll: what are some of the favorite, knock ya on your butt, smooth smokes that can be obtained in good ol' Canada?thanks for your time and good fishing.griffy

Oh no ya don't! We ain't gonna go through this again, are we? I seem to remember an incident with chewing tobacco being strewn down the left side of a mid 80's Bronco II. This was at interstate speeds by a person with a GREEN tinge to him. Are you gonna pack enny Dinty Moore stew for Canada?Cross their eyes!Fishpounder~<'{{{{{><|
